SEARCH
Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities

Interface SceneChild

All Superinterfaces:
GameNode
All Known Subinterfaces:
SceneBorderCrossingWatcher, SceneBorderTouchingWatcher
All Known Implementing Classes:
CenteredShapeEntity, CircleEntity, CompositeEntity, DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicCompositeEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, EllipseEntity, RectangleEntity, ShapeEntity, SpriteEntity, TextEntity, YaegerEntity
public interface SceneChild extends GameNode
A SceneChild is part of a YaegerScene and has thus acces to width and height of the YaegerScene it is part of.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    getSceneHeight()
    Return the height of the YaegerScene that this Entity is part of.
    double
    getSceneWidth()
    Return the width of the YaegerScene that this Entity is part of.

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.GameNode

    getNode

  • Method Details

    • getSceneWidth

      double getSceneWidth()
      Return the width of the YaegerScene that this Entity is part of. For both a StaticScene and DynamicScene, the full width is always visible. In case of a ScrollableDynamicScene, this is not the case, since it can be larger that the viewable area.
      Returns:
      the width of this YaegerScene as a double

    • getSceneHeight

      double getSceneHeight()
      Return the height of the YaegerScene that this Entity is part of. For both a StaticScene and DynamicScene, the full height is always visible. In case of a ScrollableDynamicScene, this is not the case, since it can be larger that the viewable area.
      Returns:
      the height of this YaegerScene as a double
